content: {"locationId": "11284", "organizationId": "8818", "name": "First Baptist - Oppelo", "address1": "304 Hwy 9", "address2": "", "city": "Oppelo", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72110", "country": null, "phone": "501-354-0045", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "35.09253", "longitude": "-92.767", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Conway, Perry", "languages": "English", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "Our pantry is a drive through pantry open on the Monday after the second Wednesday of each month from 8:00am-12:00am.  Registration takes place by driving under the awning of the church building.  We then direct you to the next area where we place the food in your vehicle for you.  You do not have to get out unless you wish to visit the Clothes Closet.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Judy Hammons", "contactPhone": "501-889-8606", "contactEmail": "jhammons02@hotmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 72, "regionName": "Arkansas Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1c4a6bd3-8e23-4c7c-b75a-6bd6f5204146.png", "website": "https://arkansasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
